body.name: Gillette SkinGuard Men's Razor Blades, 8 Blade Refills
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 19 - 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: MINIMIZES BLADE CONTACT WITH SENSITIVE SKIN, so you will not get as close of a shave as you would expect from our razors with 5 blades
The SKINGUARD PROTECTS SKIN FROM THE BLADES with its position between the blades to smooth skin
LUBRICATION BEFORE AND AFTER THE BLADES for glide and comfort
2 BLADES plus SKINGUARD designed for men with skin irritation, razor bumps, and razor burn
body.description: Our Gillette SkinGuard razor blade refills are clinically proven for sensitive skin with the SkinGuard feature that smooths your skin and protects it from the blades. It is designed to stop irritation with lubrication before and after the blade, working to minimize tug and pull and cut hair at the skin level. The soft microfins gently smooth and stretch skin while the microcomb guides hair to the blade. These blade refills feature our thinnest blades and a precision trimmer which is perfect for hard-to-reach places and styling facial hair. Your shave will have the right blend of closeness to avoid potential irritations you may have experienced from other razors. This may be a bit different from the Gillette shave you’ve experienced in the past but you will still get a great shave that helps stop irritation and razor bumps. SkinGuard blade refills fit all SkinGuard razor handles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Shave Above the Rest - SkinGuard Delivers!
reviews.reviewText: I've been a loyal user of Gillette razors for years, but the Gillette SkinGuard Men's Razor Blades have truly raised the bar, earning a solid 5-star review from me. With the latest 8 blade refill pack, I am reminded of why I chose Gillette in the first place – quality and innovation for a comfortable shave.The standout feature of the SkinGuard blades is their unique design aimed at minimizing skin irritation. As someone with sensitive skin prone to razor bumps and ingrown hairs, I've often struggled with finding a razor that doesn't leave my skin red and inflamed. Since making the switch to SkinGuard, I've noticed a significant reduction in these issues. The blades glide across the skin with such ease, cutting hairs efficiently without the tug and pull that can lead to irritation.One of the best aspects of these blades is their longevity. Each refill lasts me several weeks, maintaining sharpness and effectiveness throughout. This is a testament to the durability and high-quality materials Gillette has always been known for. Despite daily use, the blades do not dull quickly, ensuring that each shave is as comfortable as the last.Additionally, the precision trimmer on the back is excellent for edging and styling, making it a versatile tool for my grooming routine. It’s great for getting those tricky spots and styling sideburns or facial hair with precision and control.The value pack of 8 refills is also economical, providing a long-lasting supply that saves me the hassle of frequent repurchases. It also speaks to the confidence Gillette has in their product – they’re not just selling you a single shave; they’re offering a solution that will keep you satisfied for months to come.In terms of compatibility, these blades fit perfectly with the SkinGuard handles, and they are compatible with my existing Gillette handle, making it convenient for me to switch to these skin-friendly blades without additional investment.In summary, the Gillette SkinGuard Men's Razor Blades with the 8 Blade Refills pack is an excellent investment for anyone seeking a close, comfortable, and irritation-free shave. It’s particularly suited for men with sensitive skin, but I’d recommend it to anyone who wants a premium shave experience. Thanks to Gillette, my morning routine is now a smoother, more comfortable experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shave Ever for Sensitive Skin! Bravo, Gillette!
reviews.reviewText: Hey there, folks! Mike P. here, and I just had to drop by and share my excitement about the Gillette SkinGuard Men's Razor Blade Refill for Sensitive Skin. Let me tell you, this product has truly changed the game for me!I've always struggled with sensitive skin, and finding a razor that doesn't leave my face feeling like a battlefield was a constant challenge. But lo and behold, Gillette came to the rescue with this remarkable creation. Hats off to you, Gillette, you've really hit the bullseye this time!First things first, let's talk about the design. These blade refills are expertly crafted with precision, ensuring a smooth and comfortable shave. The four blades work harmoniously to effortlessly glide across my skin, eliminating any worry of irritation or razor burn. It's like a dance of comfort, and my skin is the lucky partner!But wait, it gets even better! The SkinGuard technology is where the real magic happens. The unique design features a gentle, yet effective guard between the blades, acting as a shield for my sensitive skin. I can practically hear my skin saying, "Thank you, Gillette, for this much-needed respite!"Now, let's talk results. With each stroke, these blades effortlessly cut through my stubble, leaving my face as smooth as a baby's bottom. I've finally found a razor that doesn't compromise on closeness or quality, and I couldn't be happier. It's like a symphony of precision, and my face is the delighted audience!I must commend Gillette for their commitment to quality and attention to detail. The durable construction of these blade refills ensures that they last a good while, saving me money in the long run. Plus, the easy-to-change design means I can swiftly swap out the blades when needed, without any fuss or frustration. It's a win-win situation, my friends!In conclusion, the Gillette SkinGuard Men's Razor Blade Refill for Sensitive Skin is a game-changer for all you folks out there with delicate facial skin. Gillette has nailed it with their innovative technology and impeccable design. If you're tired of battling irritation and longing for a smooth, comfortable shave, look no further. Trust me, you won't be disappointed.Kudos to you, Gillette, for creating a razor blade refill that's a true savior for sensitive skin. I tip my hat to you and thank you from the bottom of my heart!Cheers,Mike P.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great blades as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I've only managed to knick my head once in 6 months of using these and it was minor. Each blade lasts about a month max but they are affordable and I don't get razor bumps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin; wish they lasted longer
reviews.reviewText: I have VERY sensitive skin, and these are the only razor blades I have found that I can consistently use without tons of irritation. They work well, but I wish they held up longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They really are easy on the face.
reviews.reviewText: I tried these blades a year ago and was really impressed with them. Once I ran through them I went back to the 5-blade heads that I had left and immediately noticed the difference. These are so much easier on the face for someone like myself who has somewhat sensitive skin and they seem to last longer, too. I don't know the difference in the way they are made, but whatever it is it really works. Maybe it's the angle of the blades to the face, or maybe something else; whatever it is I'm glad they make these blades. I'm really glad these things have the edge trimmer blade at the top, too. The generic brands don't have that and so I avoid them like the plague. You see, I have a goatee that requires trimming; the generics can't do it, so I buy Gillette. But the biggest advantage of these is the comfort, and I don't know of any other blade that can compete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Resisted buying a washboard razor with all the blades. Wish I hadn't...This thing is great! Great, easy peasy shave. I used it for three shaves but probably could have gotten a couple of more out of a blade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: These are the best disposable blades I’ve used for extremely sensitive skin while also providing a close shave. Will repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product. The best price that I've seen!
reviews.reviewText: Good product. The best price that I've seen (although still very expensive razor blades). I wish they lasted longer (about 1 week if you shave with them every day).
Gosto da suavidade ao barbear. Não gosto do preço.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gillette Skinguard Men's Razor Blade Refill
reviews.reviewText: Gillette Skinguard Men's Razor Blade Refill is an excellent product that is specially designed for men with sensitive skin. This razor blade refill provides a smooth and comfortable shave, reducing skin irritation and razor bumps, which is a common problem for many men.One of the things I love about these razor blade refills is their unique design. The blades are specially engineered to glide smoothly over the skin, with a guard that helps to reduce pressure and minimize the risk of nicks and cuts. This makes them an ideal choice for men with sensitive skin who are looking for a gentle yet effective shaving experience.Another feature that sets Gillette Skinguard Men's Razor Blade Refills apart from the competition is their durability. The blades are made with high-quality materials that are designed to last longer, providing a consistent and reliable shave with every use. Additionally, the refills are easy to install and compatible with most Gillette razors, making them a convenient choice for men who want a high-quality and versatile razor blade.Overall, I highly recommend Gillette Skinguard Men's Razor Blade Refill to anyone looking for a high-quality and reliable razor blade that is gentle on sensitive skin. Its unique design, durability, and compatibility make it an excellent choice for men who want a comfortable and effective shaving experience. If you're looking for a top-quality razor blade refill, then Gillette Skinguard Men's Razor Blade Refill is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewTitle: 100% Recomendable para PRIMERIZOS en las rasuradas
reviews.reviewText: Mi opinión se basa en mis primeras impresiones. Usé este cartucho (rastrillo) con el mango Fusion-flexball: la combinación más PERFECTA. He usado los cartuchos de 5 cuchillas y me va muy bien (aunque las primeras rasuradas me irritaba la piel). Con este de 2 cuchillas y su tecnología protectora me hubiera encantado para mis primeras rasuradas de la vida. Al usarla, noté que la lubricación del rastrillo permanecía un poco más (la sentía más), y sentí muy poca irritación y una piel mucho menos lastimada. Por el otro lado, me tomó más tiempo rasurarme toda la cara porque nada más son 2 cuchillas contra 5 que uso usualmente, teniendo la barba recortada. Por ello, pasaba el rastrillo más veces en la misma zona de mi cara porque sentía que no recortaba los vellos al ras. Hubo un momento en que me corté, pero fue que me sentía un poco desesperado y presioné de más las cuchillas.En RESUMEN, los cartuchos son MUY BUENOS Y DE GRAN CALIDAD. La deben comprar jóvenes que están empezando a rasurare para que su piel se acostumbre a las rasuradas y se irrite lo menos posible, y recomendables para quienes tengan problemas de irritación, piel muy sensible, pelos encarnados, acné, espinillas o piel ya con arrugas. NO la recomiendo a hombres que tengan el vello grueso o la barba muy tupida, para ellos están las de 5 cuchillas (si no tienen algún problema crónico mencionados anteriormente). Definitivamente, EL MEJOR rastrillo de 2 cuchillas, incluso muchos de 3.

I have to say these are the best blades I have ever used, period. Having said that, they are also some of the most expensive blades I have ever purchased. I will continue to buy and use them just because the shave is so good, comfortable, gentle, use whatever good word you want. These blades are that good.
